headline: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies : Wabtec and IMT Sign Exclusive Agreement to Distribute Railcar Telematics in European Markets
summary: PARIS, July 10, 2025 - Wabtec Corporation and Intermodal Telematics B.V. , the Dutch leader in rail telematics technology, today announced an agreement expanding the exclusive distribution rights to...
